title: Anybody have a strange Stovall portrait?
author: darwinbulldog

posts.post_title: Anybody have a strange Stovall portrait?
posts.post_content: I'm looking for any of the following oddities on a T206 Stovall portrait: blank or upside-down back, full name at the top or other extreme miscut, double strike or unusual overprint, clear wet sheet transfer or ghost.
